data.title: Ontario Probate Court Records
data.text:
Use the scroll bar or the 'find' function on your Web browser to search the table below for the name of the deceased. If you find the person, note the microfilm reel number in the 'Archives of Ontario Microfilm Reference' column. You may then:

Consult the appropriate reel(s) at our reading room on the ground floor, 134 Ian Macdonald Blvd., Toronto.

Borrow the reel through the Interlibrary Loan Department of your public library. Quote MS 638 and the appropriate reel #. These reels cannot leave the borrowing library, so make sure to request them from a library that has a microfilm reader.

Purchase the appropriate microfilm reel directly from the Archives of Ontario. Quote MS 638 and the appropriate reel #. For purchasing details, write the Archives of Ontario,

134 Ian Macdonald Blvd.,

Toronto, Ontario

M7A 2C5

(put "Attention: Customer Services - Micrographics" on the envelope), telephone 416-327-1600 (call toll-free 1-800-668-9933 in Ontario only), or email reference@ontario.ca.

Click here for Surnames: "H to N", "O to Z".
